name: TANKER PONGY
description:
There are actually 2 games.

The first is a modernized version of the Pengo game appearing on different computers under different names, including Pengy on Atari, Freez'bees on ZX Spectrum and Pongy on ZX-81. The goal of the game is to kill the "slimeers" by pushing ice blocks onto them. Additionally, to go to the next stage, you have to place 3 "diamonds" in a row next to each other. Controlling with arrows or keys Q A O P.

The presentation:

The second version of the game is available here, in which the penguin is controlled with only 1 key - right Ctrl. Additionally, similar to the classic Tank Combat games, a floating tank has been added, with which our penguin fights. The gunshot is triggered when the penguin changes its direction. Only one torpedo can be used at a time. There will probably be a possibility of a duel between 2 players.

There will also be versions for Linux and Android.
